content: SPX Universal diamond blade Ultimate diamond blade with Equidist technology for superior cutting in different base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- ### FEATURES:Features Equidist technology provides superior cutting speed and performance on reinforced concrete Designed for universality on a wide range of materials, even under the toughest conditions Designed to outlast – with large, specially-bonded diamond segments Thick steel core and laser welding technology for maximum reliability and safety Easy re-ordering – scannable QR code on the blade helps you easily re-order new blades, or verify your blade’s intended base material and target tool type Applications Cutting, resizing and reshaping a wide range of mineral construction materials, especially hard and reinforced concrete, masonry and natural stone Fast cutting even in hard and reinforced base materials For use with all Hilti hand-held diamond cutting tools including angle grinders, electric cutters and gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Angle grinder, Electric cutter, Gas saw | Base material | Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2331193 -
